00023 #ifndef ADC_H
00024 #define ADC_H

00026 #ifndef F_CPU               /* CPU speed in Hz */
00027 #define F_CPU               8000000
00028 #endif
00029 
00032 #ifndef ADC_DYNAMIC_CLOCK
00033 #define ADC_DYNAMIC_CLOCK   0
00034 #endif
00035 
00037 #ifndef ADC_CLOCK_KHZ
00038 #define ADC_CLOCK_KHZ       100
00039 #endif
00040 
00045 #define FREERUN             0x01
00046 
00047 #define INTERRUPT           0x02
00048 
00049 #define SLEEP               0x04
00050 
00051 extern uint8_t adcInit(uint8_t mode,uint16_t adcClock);
00052 extern uint8_t adcStart(uint8_t channelMask);
00053 extern uint8_t adcIsBusy(void);
00054 extern int adcRead(uint8_t channel);

00058 /* Device specific settings */
00059 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega16__) || \
00060     defined(__AVR_ATmega32__) || \
00061     defined(__AVR_ATmega8535__)
00062 
00063 #define  ADC_CONTROL_REG            ADCSRA
00064 #define  ADC_MUX_REG                ADMUX
00065 #define  NUMBER_OF_ADC_CHANNELS     8
00066 #define  ADC_PORT                   A
00067 #define  ADC_PORT_IS_BIDIRECTIONAL  1
00068 #define  ADC_SPECIFIC_SLEEP_MODE    1
00069 #define  AD_FREERUN                 ADATE
00070 #define  AD_TRIGGER_REG             SFIOR
00071 
00072 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega64__)

00079 #define  ADC_SPECIFIC_SLEEP_MODE    1
00080 #define  AD_FREERUN                 ADATE
00081 #define  AD_TRIGGER_REG             ADSCRB

00161 /* REGISTER NAME FORMING */
00162 #ifndef CONCAT1
00163 #define CONCAT1(a, b) CONCAT2(a, b)
00164 #endif
00165 
00166 #ifndef CONCAT2
00167 #define CONCAT2(a, b) a ## b
00168 #endif
00169 
00170 #define ADC_PORT_OUT_REG       CONCAT1(PORT, ADC_PORT)
00171 #define ADC_PORT_DDR_REG       CONCAT1(DDR, ADC_PORT)
00172 #define ADC_PORT_PIN_REG       CONCAT1(PIN, ADC_PORT)
00173 
00174 /* Normally you shouldn't need to change the below  lines  */
00175 /* global interrupt enable register name */
00176 #ifndef  GLOBAL_INT_REG
00177 #define  GLOBAL_INT_REG        SREG
00178 #endif
00179 /* global interrupt enable bit position */
00180 #ifndef  GLOBAL_INT_BIT
00181 #define  GLOBAL_INT_BIT        7
00182 #endif
00183 
00184 /* Convenience macros (we don't use them all) */
00185 #define  _BV(bit) (1 << (bit))
00186 #define  inb(sfr) _SFR_BYTE(sfr)
00187 #define  inw(sfr) _SFR_WORD(sfr)
00188 #define  outb(sfr, val) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) = (val))
00189 #define  outw(sfr, val) (_SFR_WORD(sfr) = (val))
00190 #define  cbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) &= ~_BV(bit))
00191 #define  sbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) |= _BV(bit))
00192 
00194 #if defined(SMCR)
00195 #define  SLEEP_REG                  SMCR
00196 #else
00197 #define  SLEEP_REG                  MCUCR
00198 #endif
00199 
00207 #if !defined(ADC_FREERUN)
00208 #undef ADC_FREERUN_MODE
00209 #define ADC_FREERUN_MODE 0
00210 #endif
00211 
00215 #ifndef ADC_INTERRUPT_MODE    
00216 #define ADC_INTERRUPT_MODE  1
00217 #endif
00218 #ifndef ADC_FREERUN_MODE      
00219 #define ADC_FREERUN_MODE    0
00220 #endif
00221 #ifndef ADC_SLEEP_MODE        
00222 #define ADC_SLEEP_MODE      0
00223 #endif
00224 
00229 #if ADC_DYNAMIC_CLOCK == 0
00230 
00231 #define ADC_CLOCK_REAL (ADC_CLOCK_KHZ*1000L)
00232 
00233 #if   F_CPU/2 < ((ADC_CLOCK_REAL*12)/10)
00234 #define ADC_PRESCALER   1
00235 #elif F_CPU/4 < ((ADC_CLOCK_REAL*12)/10)
00236 #define ADC_PRESCALER   2
00237 #elif F_CPU/8 < ((ADC_CLOCK_REAL*12)/10)
00238 #define ADC_PRESCALER   3
00239 #elif F_CPU/16 < ((ADC_CLOCK_REAL*12)/10)
00240 #define ADC_PRESCALER   4
00241 #elif F_CPU/32 < ((ADC_CLOCK_REAL*12)/10)
00242 #define ADC_PRESCALER   5
00243 #elif F_CPU/64 < ((ADC_CLOCK_REAL*12)/10)
00244 #define ADC_PRESCALER   6
00245 #else
00246 #define ADC_PRESCALER   7
00247 #endif
00248 
00249 #endif
00250 
00251 #endif
